page.title: 10Activities for Children
page.content: There are lots of clubs and activities for children in{Street.}You can start some clubs when you are three or four. Some clubs teach you a skill like{ {swimming,judo,karate,trampolining, {gymnastics,tennis, cricket, {table_tennis,squash,roller_skating,and {horse_riding}.You can learn{ballet}or tap_dancing and there is a{music club where you can play a musical instrument,sing in a{choir}or do {drama.}At the youth club you can do many things including computing, skittles, and billiards.The churches in Street run clubs for children in the evenings,and on Sundays they all have Sunday schools.
